caption.center: Edna Earl BABB v. Charlie B. SKELTON.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Leake County; E.G. Cortright, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
Laurel G. Weir, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert N. Brooks, Carthage, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before GILLESPIE, C.J., and SUGG and BROOM, JJ.
